name: Alchimist
description:
You are in the dungeon.

When you kill all enemies you will be teleported into lab where you can drag the ingradients to the cauldron and  acording to what things you put into it you will get a buff next round.

banana - strenght

wind grass - speed

void chorus - faster dash

power plant - more knockback

vetrox - poison

wine - root

eye of ice - freeze

 king slayer - dmg from behind enemies is multiplied

ingredients can stack.
